BASS_APE 2.4

© 2002-2012, Sebastian Andersson (sebastian.andersson@gmail.com). All rights reserved.
Portions © 2000-2006, Matthew T. Ashland. All rights reserved.

All trademarks and other registered names contained in the BASS_APE
package are the property of their respective owners.


What is BASS_APE?
=================
BASS_APE is an extension to the BASS audio library that enables the playback
of Monkey's Audio streams.


What is APE?
============
Please visit:

http://www.monkeysaudio.com


Disclaimer
==========
BASS_APE is provided "as is" and without warranties of any kind, either express
or implied. The author assumes no liability for damages, direct or consequential,
which may result from the use of BASS_APE.


Costs
=====
The BASS_APE library is free to use and distribute.

If you enjoy BASS_APE, please consider donating money. You may use PayPal to make a donation:

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_xclick&business=sebastian%2eandersson%40gmail%2ecom&item_name=BASS%20Add%2dOns&item_number=1&no_shipping=1&no_note=1&tax=0&currency_code=EUR
